name: Fantasy Ambience Sounds Pack
description:
Fantasy Ambience Sounds Pack

31 high-quality & game-ready ambience loops for realistic Fantasy worlds: Cave, Village, Forest, Dungeon, Blacksmith, and much more.

20+ Minutes of Ambience Loops, consisting of:

  • Caves, Village, Dungeon
  • Forests (Normal, enchanted, etc...)
  • Farm, Chopping Wood, Blacksmith
  • Magical Auras
  • Fire Loops
  • Rain Loops
  • Townspeople Chatter
  • & much more...

🔊 Listen to the preview here

📜 SFX List / Documentation

More info:

  • Extremely versatile ambience loops - will bring life to all types of games.
  • Each ambience designed by professionals using unique source material, giving you huge variation for your game's ambience.
  • Mixed and mastered to a game-ready standard.

Format

All files are in:

WAV - Stereo (44.1 Khz, 16bit, Looping)

Unlimited Use

Use the ambiences as much as you desire, in any of your projects or productions, forever without any additional fees or royalties.

Designed By

The team at Daydream Sound (support@daydreamsound.com)

Tags: Ambience, Magic, Blacksmith, RPG, Fantasy Ambiences, RPG Ambiences, Forest Ambience, Village ambiences, Medieval ambience, Dungeon Ambience, Cave ambience
